comments:
I was working on a JUnit plug-in test.  What I usually do is from a suite of 
tests, I click on one of them in the JUnit view and just run that one 
individual test, and keep using the "run last test" button while I work on it.

One of the times when I ran the test I got this assertion failure to the 
console after the test completed:

org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.AssertionFailedException: assertion failed: 
The application has not been initialized.
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.Assert.isTrue(Assert.java:107)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.assertInitialized
(InternalPlatform.java:218)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.log
(InternalPlatform.java:822)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.ImplicitJobs.endJob
(ImplicitJobs.java:128)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.WorkerPool.endJob(WorkerPool.java:96)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:83)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 91291 ***

traces.message: assertion failed:  The application has not been initialized.
